You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesK K] > &kfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Kfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D50E.
  * `&kfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D528.
